July 29, 1963
BOARD OF GOVERNORS
ROBERT M. ADAMS
LILLIAN BROWN

FREDERICK S. HOUWINK
Enclosed you will find a hastily mimeographed
copy of the ATAS Speakersâ€™ Bureau questionnaire, as
requested by Miss Lillian Brown of G-eorge Washington
University.
Please accept my regrets for the delay, but I
have been waiting for this revised form from the
National Office and had this copy made from a master
for printing.
Thank you for your inquiry and I hope you will
feel free to call upon us for any information or
assistance.
Sincerely yours,
Chairman
The Speakers' Bureau
Washington Chapter
end.
